hero.headline: Applied AI & Data Systems Builder
hero.subheadline: Governing AI from data foundations to production decisions

proofSignals: Built and shipped governed AI systems used in live organizational workflows
Designed deterministic automations with AI used only where ambiguity remained
Focused on validation, auditability, and failure containment
Owned systems end-to-end from data ingestion to decision outputs
designPrinciples: Design for failure modes, not happy paths

about.experience: 3+ years building AI-enabled systems for organizations that prioritize reliability over speed
about.focus: Focus areas: data authority, decision support, agent-assisted workflows
